
This package contains the following files:

 bodydemo\bodydemo.exe
   - the interactive body editor tool

 bodydemo\bodydemo-m.bat
   - batch file to start the bodydemo in "male" mode (the default)

 bodydemo\bodydemo-f.bat
   - batch file to start the bodydemo in "female" mode

 bodydemo\bodydemo-doc.pdf
   - documentation for the body editor

 bodydemo\*.dat
   - raw data files

 bodydemo\bodydemo.sln
 bodydemo\bodydemo.vcproj
   - project files for Visual Studio .net

 bodydemo\src\*.*
   - source code

 bodydemo\icons\*.*
   - icon images

  local\*.*
   - include files and libraries for FLTK and LBFGS-B


This package may be used for academic research purposes only.

 - Brett Allen.
    allen@cs.washington.edu
